description: Scoring strategy configurations for cross-platform market matching

kalshi-polymarket.name: kalshi-polymarket
kalshi-polymarket.description: Cross-platform matching for Kalshi (concise) and Polymarket (verbose)

rationale.embeddingSimilarity: Highest weight - captures semantic meaning across different writing styles
rationale.categoryMatch: High weight - critical signal for same event
rationale.titleSimilarity: Medium weight - after normalization removes style differences
rationale.keywordOverlap: Medium weight - important after normalizing verbose Polymarket text
rationale.descriptionSimilarity: Low weight - Kalshi descriptions often empty
rationale.lengthRatio: Very low weight - would penalize cross-platform matches
rationale.minMatchScore: Lower threshold (55 vs 70) - accommodates cross-platform differences

kalshi-predictit.name: kalshi-predictit
kalshi-predictit.description: Cross-platform matching for Kalshi and PredictIt (multi-contract)

rationale.titleSimilarity: Higher weight - both use concise formats
rationale.embeddingSimilarity: Lower weight - text similarity sufficient for same-style platforms

rationale.titleSimilarity: Highest weight - expect very high similarity for duplicates
rationale.minMatchScore: High threshold (85) - strict matching for same platform

notes: Weights must sum to 1.0 for each strategy
Cross-platform strategies emphasize semantic features over exact text match
Same-platform strategies emphasize exact text similarity
minConfidence < 1.0 allows fallback features when primary features fail
Normalizers standardize text before feature extraction
